name: Pulsating Witch
title: Lisa: Pulsating Witch
desc: As a Librarian who has read through tens of thousands of volumes, of course it's trivial for me to remember how to win...
inPlayDescription: After you switch to <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Lisa, who has this card equipped: Attach <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Conductive to the opposing active character. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Lisa to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: After you switch to <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Lisa, who has this card equipped: Attach <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Conductive to the opposing active character. (Once per Round)(You must have Lisa in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
